name.baseName: Sediment restoration ; in-situ capping ; activated carbon ;Capping operation
底泥修复;原位覆盖;生物炭;覆盖

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Use of capping vessel to cap the AC on the sediment.
使用疏浚船完成覆盖材料的覆盖。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: There is no clear start time for data collection in the literature, and the start time of the validity period is based on the publication time of the literature
文献中没有明确数据收集的开始时间，以文献发表时间为有效期的开始时间

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: After investigation, no relevant domestic research literature has been found yet.
经查询，暂未找到国内有相关研究文献

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: capping material was used of 2 kg /m2. Density is 0.5 tonnes / m3.
覆盖材料的使用量为2 kg /m2，密度为0.5 吨/m3。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The industrial process described pertains to the restoration of sediment using in-situ capping with activated carbon (AC). This process is designed for environmental remediation activities, particularly for in-situ treatment of contaminated sediment. Activated carbon is used to cap and isolate contaminants within the sediment, effectively reducing their bioavailability and environmental impact. This method is applicable in water bodies where sediment contamination poses ecological or health risks and is suitable for large-scale applications in bodies of water in Southern China.
该工业过程描述了使用原位覆盖技术和生物炭进行底泥修复。这个过程是为环境修复活动而设计的，特别是对受污染沉积物的原位处理。使用活性炭对沉积物中的污染物进行覆盖和隔离，有效减少了它们的生物可用性和环境影响。此方法适用于沉积物污染对生态或健康风险构成威胁的水体，并适合于中国南方水域的大规模应用。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: . The life cycle inventories, i.e. the aggregated environmental data collected for the modeled system, are derived from three sources. The main source used for the majority of processes is the Ecoinvent 2.2 database.
Process inventory data是根据ISO 14040关于LCA.35的规定获得的。基本数据来自特定场地的盆栽实验、中试和供应商处获取，这些数据代表了中国南方的情况。二级数据来自Ecoinvent数据库v2.3，从中选择了地理来源和技术因素最相似的过程。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Sparrevik et al. Use of Life Cycle Assessments To Evaluate the Environmental Footprint of Contaminated Sediment Remediation. Environ. Sci. Technol. 2011, 45, 10, 4235–4241
Sparrevik et al. Use of Life Cycle Assessments To Evaluate the Environmental Footprint of Contaminated Sediment Remediation. Environ. Sci. Technol. 2011, 45, 10, 4235–4241

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA dataset for sediment restoration projects, it is important to ensure that the methodological framework aligns with ISO 14040 standards. The primary data are gathered from pot experiments, pilot-scale studies, and supplier information, representing conditions in Southern China. Secondary data are sourced from Ecoinvent database version 2.3, with selections made based on geographic and technological similarity. Users should validate the temporal relevance of the data, considering that the start of the validity period is the publication time of the source literature. Use caution with geographic and technological applicability when extrapolating data to different contexts. The use of capping material is quantified at 2 kg/m2 with a density of 0.5 tonnes/m3, and this should be factored into the inventory calculations according to the specific site conditions and coverage requirements.

在使用此LCA数据集进行底泥修复项目时，重要的是确保方法论框架与ISO 14040标准一致。主要数据来自盆栽实验、中试研究和供应商信息，代表中国南方的情况。二级数据来源于Ecoinvent数据库2.3版本，选择基于地理和技术相似性进行了筛选。使用者应当验证数据的时间相关性，考虑到有效期的起始时间是源文献的发表时间。在将数据外推到不同环境时，要小心地理和技术的适用性。覆盖材料的使用定量为2 kg/m2，密度为0.5吨/m3，应根据具体场地条件和覆盖要求将其计入清单计算。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 这里指的是采用活性炭覆盖的底泥沉积物影响区域，用面积表示
